column4: hey people, my firefox upgraded to 3.5.4pre and I am having problems with it. How do I degrade, my synaptic only seems to have the pre version
hey people, my firefox upgraded to 3.5.4pre and I am having problems with it. How do I degrade, my synaptic only seems to have the pre version?
are you in jaunty ?
yeah, its jaunty
then it is impossible that firefox upgraded to 3.5.4pre by itself
well, I have added a couple of repositories, maybe they did it. I mean I updated and it updated the firefox to 3.5.4pre.
what "couple of repositories" you added?
deb http://in.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ jaunty-security main restricted
http://paste.ubuntu.com/283890/
http://paste.ubuntu.com/283890/
probably the update came via http://paste.ubuntu.com/283890/
probably the update came via deb http://ppa.launchpad.net/ubuntu-mozilla-daily/ppa/ubuntu jaunty main
but i dunno what to add... you got what you asked for...
thanks, I'll try removing that
tracker cache ? or thumbnails cache (whatched a lot of pr0n? ;P) ? check with Aplicactions>Accesories>Disk use analizer
lol, no. Thanks, I'll reply with my results
Aplicactions>Accesories>Disk use analizer is a graphical up. very nice to spot this kind of things
hey
remember me?
can you refresh ?
My HDD space was disappearing. Well, I couldn't figure out and yeah, a restart did bring the space back. But today 1.5GB is gone. I certainly can't keep losing space like that.
